author: Lauren Murphy
title: MusicNews | Listen: Beyonce and Drake collaborate on new song 'Can I' - hear it in full now
text:
It may be a couple of years since Beyoncé released her last album, but she's not sitting around twiddling her thumbs, either.
In fact, following her r ecent collaboration with Naughty Boy , another new Queen Bey -featured song has just been revealed.
She's teamed up with Drake on his song 'Can I' - the second time that the pair have collaborated, following their pairing on 'Mine', a track from Beyoncé's last album in 2013.
Hear ' Can I' below now:
